subject: Cricket
Courts
Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: Few England cricketers of the past quarter-century have been more vividly gifted, or left such an impression of unfulfilled potential, as Chris Lewis. None has fallen further.
snippet: Few England cricketers of the past quarter-century have been more vividly gifted, or left such an impression of unfulfilled potential, as Chris Lewis. None has fallen further.
